§quizBalls

§quizQuestion
What will be displayed in the console?



§quizJS
var readContent = (str = 'student') => {
  var i = str.length, res = ''
  while (i --> -1) res += str.substr(i + 1, 1)
  return res
}

console.log(readContent('12345'))


§rightInput
54321
'54321'
"54321"
